page.title: 07CORDWELL FARM
page.content: {Cordwell farm}is situated near Millthorpe in Cordwell valley.It is an {intensive mixed farm}covering 250 acres of scattered land.3000 laying hens are kept in battery houses at a year at a time.Beef and dairy cattle,turkeys,ducklings and chickens are also kept.A{farm shop}provides a{ {retail outlet}for farm produce which includes eggs,turkey roll,milk, beef,butter,potatoes,duckling and chickens. The majority of the{sloping fields} are mainly{covered}with{grass}to make{ {silage}for{winter fodder}.The dairy cattle are Ayrshire_south Devon cross breed.The farm has been in the family for over 500 years and the farmhouse was dated 1669.The milk goes to a Sheffield dairy and the ducklings to resturants.
